course.subject: CENG
course.name: Global Health Ethics
course.description: This is an on-line course co-offered with the University of Southern California. Each week the students and the instructors including guest speakers will meet virtually at the same time to discuss and analyze ethical dilemmas that impact biomedical and psychosocial Human Subjects research through case studies, class discussions, interactions with key international ethicists, and role play. Adobe Connect will be used. Technical support will be provided to the students enrolled in this course.
